contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date= October 2009}} <!--ARTICLE'S INFOBOX -- SCROLL DOWN SEVERAL LINES FOR ARTICLE'S SUMMARY--> {{Infobox Slovak district | subject_name = Zvolen District | slovak_region = [[Banská Bystrica Region]] | population = 67650 | population_as_of = 2001 | prefix = 45 | area = 759 | image_location = Okres zvolen.png | }} <!--//END OF INFOBOX--> '''Zvolen District''' (''okres Zvolen'') is a [[Districts of Slovakia|district]] in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]] of central [[Slovakia]]. Until 1918, most of the present-day district belonged to the [[Zvolen county]], apart from [[Lešť]] in the south-west which was part of the [[Administrative divisions of the Kingdom of Hungary|county]] of [[Gömör-Kishont|Gemer a Malohont]]. == Municipalities == *[[Babiná]] *[[Bacúrov]] *[[Breziny]] *[[Budča]] *[[Bzovská Lehôtka]] *[[Dobrá Niva]] *[[Dubové, Zvolen District|Dubové]] *[[Hronská Breznica]] *[[Kováčová, Zvolen District|Kováčová]] *[[Lešť]] *[[Lieskovec, Zvolen District|Lieskovec]] *[[Lukavica, Zvolen District|Lukavica]] *[[Michalková]] *[[Očová]] *[[Ostrá Lúka]] *[[Pliešovce]] *[[Podzámčok]] *[[Sása, Zvolen District|Sása]] *[[Sielnica]] *'''[[Sliač]]''' *[[Tŕnie]] *[[Turová]] *[[Veľká Lúka]] *'''[[Zvolen]]''' *[[Zvolenská Slatina]] *[[Železná Breznica]] {{Banska Bystrica Region}} {{coord|48|34|33|N|19|7|32|E|source:itwiki_type:adm2nd|display=title}} [[Category:Districts of Slovakia]] [[Category:1918 establishments]] {{BanskáBystrica-geo-stub}}
